definition[0]: food, liquid etc that is lukewarm is slightly warm and often not as hot or cold as it should be
example[0]: She sipped some lukewarm coffee from her mug.
definition[1]: not showing much interest or excitement
example[1]: His idea got only a lukewarm response from the committee.
example[2]: The market reaction to its flotation was lukewarm.
example[3]: The proposal is expected to get a lukewarm reception from small businesses.
